title: Legal Status vs.\ Physical Access: Testing the Cannabis-Alcohol Substitution Hypothesis at State BordersThis paper is a revision of APEP-0093. See https://github.com/anthropics/auto-policy-evals/tree/main/papers/apep_0093 for the original. (v4)
revision_rationale: User requested improvements to statistical power, border-by-border investigation of 2km donut anomaly, and formal MDE analysis
